item.title: Auto save not working
item.dc:creator: @Dipset Dipset
item.description:
@Dipset wrote:

i followed this…

Add this by your booleans and ints

[code]public static boolean AutoSave = false;
public int savecounter = 0;[/code]

Add this in the boolean process

	[code]savecounter++;
	if(savecounter >= 60 && AutoSave == false) {
		AutoSave = true;
		savecounter = 0;
	}[/code]

Just Change The 60 to what ever time you want it to save… It is in seconds, right now it saves every 60 seconds

still dosent work…

Read full topic
